posting_body: Tremont is one of Cleveland's most complete urban neighborhoods and is known today for its award-winning restaurants, lively art scene, boutique shops, and trendy homes.
This unit on 2151 Professor is within eye-sight of several celebrity chef restaurants including Dante, Ginko, Bar Oni, Ty Fun and Fahrenheit.
The property is also situated in eyesight of the Towpath Trail and offers easy access to the Shoreway, I-90 and downtown Cleveland.
Spacious living room, hardwood floors, balcony, laundry and parking available onsite.
